_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000edd3-c8fc-8000-9e0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
  label: "",
  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
  emptyGridMessage: "",
  showExportButton: true,
  data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
    recordType: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause,
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.refClauseId,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!refClauseId,
        applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!refClauseId)
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.isActive,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      )
    }
  ),
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.ruleName,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.ruleName]
          )
        },
        preventWrapping: true
      ),
      width: "2X"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
        tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
          text: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isDraft],
            "Draft",
            rule!AS_GCM_DSP_clauseStatus(
              isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive],
              bundle: ri!bundle
            )
          ),
          backgroundColor: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isDraft],
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "BLUE_5"),
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive],
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GREEN_1"),
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_1")
          ),
          textColor: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isDraft],
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "BLUE_6"),
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.isActive],
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GREEN_4"),
            rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_4")
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "1X"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Applicability",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.refUsageId,
      value: displayvalue(
        fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.refUsageId],
        {
          cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_INCLUDED,
          cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_USAGE_EXCLUDED
        },
        {
          "Includes",
          "Excludes"
        },
        cons!AS_GCM_TEXT_HYPHEN
      ),
      width: "1X"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.modifiedDatetime,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(
        fv!row[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.modifiedDatetime]
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Rule Condition Clause.rule.modifiedDatetime,
    ascending: false
  ),
  validations: {},
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  rowHeader: 1,
  userFilters: {
    #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:332a532b-db8b-4352-986c-a6a050794136/3b62d7ed-f126-4833-ac8e-0f6e7b21fd51",
    #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:332a532b-db8b-4352-986c-a6a050794136/ca50ad78-f6af-4b77-b56a-620873d28dd3"
  },
  showRefreshButton: false
)

_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField
_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionField_v1"(
  actions: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!actions,
    expression: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionItem(
      action: fv!item,
      identifier: ri!identifier
    )
  ),
  style: ri!style,
  display: ri!display,
  openActionsIn: ri!openActionsIn,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  securityOnDemand: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!securityOnDemand,
    /* By default setting the value to false when the automation toggle is turned on as the Fitnesse doesn't support this feature yet. */
    default: and(
      cons!AS_GCM_BOL_RECORD_ACTION_SECURITY_ON_DEMAND_TOGGLE,
      not(
        cons!AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
      ),
      contains({ "MENU", "MENU_ICON" }, ri!style)
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getReferenceSectionData

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The modifierMaps should have the below structure
{
a!map(
field: <The field which needs to be modified>,
find: Optional when findRegex is provided - The value to find,
findRegex: Optional when find is provided - The regex search performed to replace the value,
replaceWith: The value to replace with. When left blank the find values will be removed,
instanceNum: The instance number to which replace. Use only when the find is passed,
replaceAllInstances: Default true - Determines whether all the instances need to be replaced
applyWhen: When false this map will be skipped
),
...
}
*/
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!modifierMaps),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!data,
    expression: reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer(data: _, modifierMap: _),
      fv!item,
      ri!modifierMaps
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_extractBalancedTagThatHasGivenText

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getTemplate

_a-0000e841-a36f-8000-9bfa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DSP_showOrHideChangesLink

_a-0000e8cc-c513-8000-9c0f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_formatCurrencyValue

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getRefData

_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_updateDataByModifierMaps_Reducer
_a-0000ec90-d194-8000-9dac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
      input: index(ri!data, ri!modifierMap.field, null)
    ),
    ri!modifierMap.applyWhen
  ),
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
    ri!data,
    ri!modifierMap.field,
    a!match(
      value: ri!modifierMap,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find)
      ),
      then: error(
        "Only one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.findRegex),
      then: if(
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum),
        error(
          "instanceNum should be null when passing a value to findRegex"
        ),
        regexreplaceall(
          ri!modifierMap.findRegex,
          ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
          ri!modifierMap.replaceWith
        )
      ),
      whenTrue: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.find),
      then: rule!AS_GCM_substituteListFromTextUsingReduce(
        text: ri!data[ri!modifierMap.field],
        find: ri!modifierMap.find,
        replaceWith: ri!modifierMap.replaceWith,
        instanceNum: ri!modifierMap.instanceNum,
        replaceAllInstances: a!defaultValue(
          value: ri!modifierMap.replaceAllInstances,
          default: a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!modifierMap.instanceNum)
        )
      ),
      default: error(
        "Alteast one of two parameters should have values: findRegex or find"
      )
    )
  ),
  ri!data
)

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getRefClauseAudits
_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_R_A_R_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_A_R_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "clauseId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!clauseId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "auditActionCode",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UNCHANGED
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

AS_GCM_GRD_clauseSetsGrid
_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isClauseReportingView: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId),
  local!logicalExpForClauseSetQuery: a!match(
    value: rule!AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups(
      groups: cons!AS_GAM_GRP_CONTRACTING_MANAGER,
      user: loggedInUser()
    ),
    whenTrue: local!isClauseReportingView,
    then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "AND_ALL",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.clauses.clauseId,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!clauseId
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.clauses.isActive,
          operator: "=",
          value: true
        )
      }
    ),
    whenTrue: or(fv!value, ri!isAllClauseSets = true),
    then: {},
    default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "OR",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractingOfficer,
          operator: "=",
          value: loggedInUser()
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractSpecialist,
          operator: "=",
          value: loggedInUser()
        )
      }
    )
  ),
  local!latestGeneratingClauseSet: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails(
      useQueryRecord: true,
      additionalFilters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatusId,
          operator: "=",
          value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CLAUSE_SET_STATUS_GENERATING
        )
      },
      logicalExpression: local!logicalExpForClauseSetQuery,
      returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
      sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
        ascending: false
      ),
      executeWhen: true
    ),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridField_v3"(
    label: if(
      local!isClauseReportingView,
      "",
      ""
    ),
    labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
    emptyGridMessage: if(
      or(
        ri!isAllClauseSets = true,
        local!isClauseReportingView
      ),
      "No clause sets available",
      ""
    ),
    data: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordData"(
      recordType: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set,
      filters: local!logicalExpForClauseSetQuery
    ),
    columns: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.formattedTitle,
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: {
            rule!AS_GCM_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
              recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.formattedTitle],
              recordType: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set,
              recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            char(10),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                bundle: ri!bundle,
                bundleKey: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refType.refKey]
              ),
              color: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(colorName: "GRAY_3")
            )
          }
        ),
        align: "START",
        width: "AUTO"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.refLabel,
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagField"(
          tags: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_tagItem_v1"(
            text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              bundle: ri!bundle,
              bundleKey: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.refKey]
            ),
            backgroundColor: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(
              fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.backgroundColor]
            ),
            textColor: rule!AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName(
              fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.refStatus.refColor]
            )
          )
        ),
        align: "START",
        width: "NARROW"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "Contract Type",
        value: a!defaultValue(
          value: joinarray(
            a!flatten(
              index(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_indexWhere(
                  value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId],
                  initialArray: ri!allclauseSetContractTypeMaps.setId,
                  finalArray: ri!allclauseSetContractTypeMaps.contractType
                ),
                "contractCode",
                {}
              )
            ),
            ", "
          ),
          default: "-"
        ),
        align: "START",
        width: "NARROW_PLUS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "Codes",
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "PSC",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            a!defaultValue(
              value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.pscCode],
              default: "-"
            ),
            char(10),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "NAICS",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            a!defaultValue(
              value: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.naicsCode],
              default: "-"
            )
          }
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "Dollar Amount",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.estimatedDollarAmt,
        value: rule!AS_GCM_DPL_CO_UT_formatCurrencyValue(
          currencyValue: todecimal(
            fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.estimatedDollarAmt]
          ),
          currencyCode: cons!AS_CO_TXT_DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CODE,
          showDecimal: true(),
          showHyphen: true()
        ),
        align: "END"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "CO/CS",
        value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "CO",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(
              user: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractingOfficer],
              showHyphenIfValueNull: true
            ),
            char(10),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: concat(
                "CS",
                ": "
              ),
              style: "STRONG"
            ),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_displayUser(
              user: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.contractSpecialist],
              showHyphenIfValueNull: true
            )
          }
        )
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        label: "",
        sortField: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
        value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(
          dateTime: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime]
        ),
        align: "END",
        width: "NARROW_PLUS"
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
        value: rule!AS_GCM_CP_recordActionField(
          actions: {
            #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/0ec7fcf2-19a9-42f3-8275-939107a9c66c",
            #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/ab67ee21-86ba-4bd0-aa0c-8e6cc9a3e7b8"
          },
          style: "MENU_ICON",
          display: "LABEL",
          identifier: fv!row[recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.setId]
        ),
        align: "END",
        width: "ICON",
        showWhen: not(local!isClauseReportingView)
      )
    },
    pageSize: if(local!isClauseReportingView,cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM,cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE),
    initialSorts: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
      ascending: false()
    ),
    pagingSaveInto: fv!pagingInfo,
    validations: {},
    borderStyle: "LIGHT",
    shadeAlternateRows: false(),
    rowHeader: 1,
    /* Grid will not be refreshed if there are no clause sets generating or the time limit has exceeded. */
    refreshInterval: if(
      and(
        not(local!isClauseReportingView),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!latestGeneratingClauseSet),
        now() < a!addDateTime(
          startDateTime: index(
            local!latestGeneratingClauseSet,
            recordType!AS GCM Clause Set.modifiedDatetime,
            null
          ),
          minutes: cons!AS_GCM_INT_CLAUSE_SET_GRID_AUTO_REFRESH_TIME_OUT_MINUTES
        )
      ),
      0.5,
      null
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION",
    userFilters: {
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/072d36cf-ecbd-4412-b60d-68209a74c6e4",
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/a9fe0655-ad64-49c5-ae8b-0975b9a327a3",
      if(
        local!isClauseReportingView,
        #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/bea61626-61d1-4417-8481-0259c6f0db4b",
        {
          #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/7767dec4-2d0f-4209-885b-7b04685497d7",
          #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/a04580ba-7f16-4299-bfc0-c3d381703dcd",
          #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/40ca5972-1954-4380-b18e-5b24e1746c4b"
        }
      ),
      #"urn:appian:user-filter:v1:474117cd-fb9d-413e-9656-09e5f8bd3f06/57df4238-ccd5-4cea-b304-2ceb73098015",

    },
    showSearchBox: true,
    showRefreshButton: not(local!isClauseReportingView),
    showExportButton: true
  )
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_SCT_clauseTextForSummary

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_constructAuditCommentForRefClauseFields

_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_regexsearch
_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule is used to handle the weird behaviour seen sometimes in the regexsearch function where the returned data is not indexable or erroring out. 
To fix this we are explicitly casting to make it proper.
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: regexsearch(
    ri!pattern,
    ri!searchString,
    ri!regexFlag,
    ri!returnGroups
  ),
  expression: a!map(
    match: touniformstring(index(fv!item, "match", "")),
    startPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "startPosition", null)),
    endPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "endPosition", null)),
    groups: rule!AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList(index(fv!item, "groups", null))
  )
)

_a-0000e36c-7599-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtFields_primitiveTypeCheckHandler

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_GRD_refClauseChangesAudit

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
          {
            ri!fields,
            index(
              ri!relatedRecordData,
              "relationship",
              null
            )
          }
        ),
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshInterval: ri!refreshInterval,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains

_a-0000e63a-a5cb-8000-9bc6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetDetails

_a-0000ebf3-ee42-8000-9d69-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_doesHtmlContainVisibleCharacters

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_GAM_COMP_richTextFieldWithTablePlugin
_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/* Context: on page load, any editable RichTextField will load, rendering Quill's logic to format the input into a "Quill-style" HTML. RichTextField will also render when there is any interaction with the form via other components, because it's default set to refreshAlways=true. We want to address the scenario where if the user makes an interaction with the form but does not modify the value of the RichTextField, the naive implementation of RichTextField will update the original input text value to be "Quill-styled". This causes issues in GCM when trying to compare the stored HTML (that wasn't actually updated in the RichTextField but because of another form interaction causing the "Quill-style" to be applied) to the HTML from acquisition.gov. The fix works as follow: 1) Upon loading the form, we will store the original input text value 2) Upon loading the form, we will also store the Quill-style HTML based on the original input text value 3) During each trigger of RichTextField's saveInto (either because of another component's interaction or the RichTextField's interaction), we will check to see if the current Quill-style HTML is the same as the original Quill-style HTML. 3a) If they are the same, this means that either there was an interaction with a non-RTE component or that the user reverted their changes to the original input text value. We will then output the original HTML value, instead of the Quill-style HTML 3b) If they are different, this means that the user changed the input value in the RTE, and therefore we need to store the Quill-style HTML Refer to the comments for local!originalText, local!quillFormattedOriginalText, and for the saveIntos for the RTE Implications/TO-DOs: 1) If the RTE is first rendered as read-only on form load, then Quill will not execute to render the Quill-style HTML. Even if there was a checkbox to turn the RTE editable, Quill had already loaded and so making it editable does not cause it to execute. This means that we cannot get the Quill-style HTML based on the original input text value at load. 2) If there is another component on the page that causes the input text to be updated (e.g., there is a dropdown that depending on the value of the dropdown causes the initial text to change), then we will always be storing Quill-style HTML of those input texts. However, perhaps this is what is expected. */ /* RichTextField doesn't support validations on the "required" field. Refer to https://community.appian.com/w/the-appian-playbook/1378/end-user-rich-text-editor-component. This implementation of RTE uses section-level validations if required=true in the RTE */ a!localVariables( local!required: if( ri!readOnly = true, false, rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!required) ), /*This stores the original text value on page load*/ local!originalText: a!refreshVariable( value: ri!text, refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false ), /*This stores the original text value on page load -- but in quill format*/ /*And the way this is actually set is through RTE's immediate save-out on page load of an editable RTE*/ /*To actually pass back out the "quill-style" HTML*/ local!quillFormattedOriginalText: null, if( cons!AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: ri!label, labelPosition: ri!labelPosition, readOnly: ri!readOnly, required: ri!required, requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage( label: ri!label, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage ), validations: ri!validations, instructions: ri!instructions, characterLimit: a!defaultValue( ri!maxSize, cons!AS_GAM_INT_RTE_MAX_CHARACTERS ), value: substitute( joinarray(split(ri!text, "

"), char(10)), "

", "" ), saveInto: a!save( ri!text, "

" & joinarray(split(save!value, char(10)), "

") & "

" ) ), { richTextFieldWithTables( label: ri!label, labelPosition: ri!labelPosition, richTextValue: ri!text, richTextSaveInto: if( /*Added condition to handle saves on readonly */ri!readOnly = true(), {}, { if( /*This checks that the save-out is the initial RTE save out that happens on page load*/ and( rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!quillFormattedOriginalText), rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!originalText) ), /*On the very first load of the page, only save into quillFormattedOriginalText*/ /*This save out happens any time an editable rich text field is rendered*/ /*We can determine if its the first load by checking that quillFormattedOriginalText is null*/ a!save( local!quillFormattedOriginalText, save!value ), /*On subsequent interactions, first check if the quillFormattedOriginalText value is different than the original*/ /*And if so, only then perform the true saves we want*/ if( /*preventing ri!text save by updating ri!triggerSave as false*/ /*saving ri!triggerSave as true if ri!triggerSave=false as we need to update it to true anyways to trigger ri!text save*/ /*scenario: Enabling the button save when there is no change in clause RTE but a change in fill-in type dropdown*/ ri!triggerSave = false, a!save(ri!triggerSave, true), { a!save( ri!text, a!match( value: save!value, whenTrue: not( rule!AS_GCM_doesHtmlContainVisibleCharacters(text: fv!value) ), then: "", whenTrue: exact( tostring(fv!value), tostring(local!quillFormattedOriginalText) ), then: /*Run a "save" that sets ri!text back to its original value*/ local!originalText, default: /*Update ri!text*/ regexreplaceall( /* Removing the transparent background colors to make sure to pasted text is proper */ "background\-color:(" & char(32) & ")?(transparent|#ffffff|#FFFFFF);?", fv!value, "" ) ) ) } ) ), ri!saveInto } ), readOnly: ri!readOnly, required: ri!required, height: ri!height, validations: ri!validations, instructions: ri!instructions, maxSize: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull( nullableValue: ri!maxSize, replacementValue: cons!AS_GAM_INT_RTE_MAX_CHARACTERS ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"( showWhen: local!required, marginBelow: "NONE", validations: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_validationMessage"( message: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage( label: ri!label, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage ), validateAfter: "SUBMIT", showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!text) ) ) } ) )

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_clauseSummary

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField
_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: ri!icon), " " },
      showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!icon)
    ),
    ri!recordTitle
  },
  link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
    label: ri!recordTitle,
    recordtype: ri!recordType,
    identifier: ri!recordIdentifier,
    showWhen: ri!linkShowWhen
  ),
  linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
  size: "STANDARD",
  style: ri!style,
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  color: ri!color
)

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_loadBundleByNames
AS_GCM_DSP_clauseEditable

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getRefClauseAuditsWithBatching
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!clauseAuditIds: rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
    entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_R_A_R_CLAUSE,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, - 1),
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: "clauseId",
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!clauseId
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: "auditActionCode",
        operator: "<>",
        value: cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_UNCHANGED
      ),
      ri!additionalFilters
    },
    selectionColumns: { "clauseAuditId" },
    logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    executeWhen: and(
      ri!executeWhen,
      or(
        any(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
          {
            ri!additionalFilters,
            ri!logicalExpression,
            ri!aggregation
          }
        ),
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId)
      )
    )
  ).identifiers,
  local!batches: rule!AS_GCM_UT_getIdentifiersInBatches(
    identifiers: local!clauseAuditIds,
    batchingSize: a!defaultValue(ri!batchingSize, cons!AS_GCM_INT_QUERY_BATCH_SIZE_EXTRA_TINY),
    returnType: ri!returnType,
    pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, - 1)
  ),
  local!data: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!clauseAuditIds),
    {},
    a!flatten(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!batches,
        expression: if(
          and(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: ri!selectionColumns),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(value: ri!aggregation)
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_UT_nullifyEmptyNestedCdtFields(
            cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
              type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_A_R_Clause?list',
              value: rule!AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection(
                entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_R_A_R_CLAUSE,
                entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_R_A_R_Clause',
                returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
                pagingInfo: a!defaultValue(
                  value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, - 1),
                  default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
                    startIndex: 1,
                    batchSize: count(fv!item.identifiers),
                    sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "timestamp", ascending: false)
                  )
                ),
                filters: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                    field: "clauseAuditId",
                    operator: "in",
                    value: fv!item.identifiers
                  )
                },
                selectionColumns: ri!selectionColumns,
                logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
                triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
                executeWhen: and(
                  ri!executeWhen,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers)
                )
              ).data
            )
          ),
          rule!AS_GCM_QE_getRefClauseAudits(
            clauseId: ri!clauseId,
            returnType: a!defaultValue(
              value: ri!returnType,
              default: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
            ),
            executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(input: fv!item.identifiers),
            aggregation: ri!aggregation,
            logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
            additionalFilters: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
                field: "clauseAuditId",
                operator: "in",
                value: fv!item.identifiers
              )
            },
            pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1, - 1),
            triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
            sort: ri!sort
          ).data
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GCM_UT_formatDataBasedOnReturnType(
    data: local!data,
    pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
    returnType: ri!returnType
  )
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getColorBasedOnColorName
_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)
